title: INVENTORY / PHOTO OF TATTOOS
description: instant photo of the hanged man's tattoos by Kim Kitsuragi

dialogueTree.title: Photo of Tattoos: "An intricate web of blue lines stre..."
dialogueTree.text: An intricate web of blue lines stretches across the torso of the hanged man, from the right shoulder to the solar plexus. Each time the lines intersect, a small white star is formed in their crossing. Hundreds of fading asterisks riddle his skin; their concentration is highest around his heart.

links.title: Photo of Tattoos: "It still kind of looks like a map o..."
links.text: It still kind of looks like a map of the stars in the night sky, but... something's not right.

links.title: You: "What's the meaning of this tattoo?"
links.text: What's the meaning of this tattoo?

links.title: Photo of Tattoos: "For you to discover. You've gotten..."
links.text: For you to discover. You've gotten as far as you will without assistance.

links.title: Suggestion: "Someone close to the victim might k..."
links.text: Someone close to the victim might know.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Someone who knows about history cou..."
links.text: Someone who knows about history could tell you.

links.title: Photo of Tattoos: "It almost looks like the electronic..."
links.text: It almost looks like the electronic patterns inside a radiocomputer or an old filament memory, but not quite.

links.title: Photo of Tattoos: "The pattern still kind of has an et..."
links.text: The pattern still kind of has an ethnic feel to it, but nothing familiar...

links.title: Photo of Tattoos: "It could be anything... religious s..."
links.text: It could be anything... religious symbols, a road map. It could even be purely decorative. Who knows?
